blogPost.excerpt: We made deepfake save simple and legal for you 🙂. So now you can have fun with this technology. Try more than 30 templates with 12 voices. Send to a friend a parody Merry Christmas greeting from celebrities 🤣🎉
blogPost.body: We made deepfake save simple and legal for you 🙂. So now you can have fun with this technology. Try more than 30 templates with 12 voices. Send to a friend a parody Merry Christmas greeting from celebrities 🤣🎉
blogPost.title: Deepfake Christmas Сongratulations - Send your loved ones a funny and unique video congratulation
blogPost.author: Vlad Sveshnikov

localize.description: 我们为你做了简单而合法的深度假拯救，🙂。所以现在你可以享受这项技术的乐趣了。尝试使用12种声音的30多个模板。向朋友发送名人🤣🎉的恶搞圣诞祝福
localize.tagline: 向你所爱的人发送一段有趣而独特的祝贺视频

localize.description: 我們爲你做了簡單而合法的深度假拯救，🙂。所以現在你可以享受這項技術的樂趣了。嘗試使用12種聲音的30多個模板。向朋友發送名人🤣🎉的惡搞聖誕祝福
localize.tagline: 向你所愛的人發送一段有趣而獨特的祝賀視頻

previous.excerpt: Anonymously vouch for the best engineers among your LinkedIn connections and get $1500 for everyone who gets hired. You get assured $20 for just syncing your LinkedIn. Help your friends get connected to top Y-Combinator founders directly. No recruiters.
previous.title: Hiring Club - Recommend engineers to top startups and earn $1500 per hire

localize.description: 匿名为你的LinkedIn关系中最优秀的工程师打保票，每个被录用的人都能得到1500美元。只要同步你的LinkedIn，你就能保证获得20美元。帮助你的朋友直接与Y-Combinator的顶级创始人取得联系。没有招聘人员。
localize.tagline: 向顶级创业公司推荐工程师，每聘一次就能赚1500元。

localize.description: 匿名爲你的LinkedIn關係中最優秀的工程師打保票，每個被錄用的人都能得到1500美元。只要同步你的LinkedIn，你就能保證獲得20美元。幫助你的朋友直接與Y-Combinator的頂級創始人取得聯繫。沒有招聘人員。
localize.tagline: 向頂級創業公司推薦工程師，每聘一次就能賺1500元。

next.excerpt: Everyone speaks the same language - visual 🌅. So make your backend - visual! Draw your backend architecture, code right in the browser, and execute - all on the same whiteboard. Forget about logs or having to guess what your code does. SEE it in real time 😍
next.title: STATEWIZE - Visual software development ecosystem. Draw + Code + Execute

localize.description: 大家都在说同一种语言--可视化🌅。所以，让你的后台--可视化! 在浏览器中画出你的后端架构和代码，并在同一白板上执行。忘记日志或猜测你的代码做什么。实时查看😍
localize.tagline: 可视化软件开发生态系统。绘制+代码+执行

localize.description: 大家都在說同一種語言--可視化🌅。所以，讓你的後臺--可視化! 在瀏覽器中畫出你的後端架構和代碼，並在同一白板上執行。忘記日誌或猜測你的代碼做什麼。實時查看😍
localize.tagline: 可視化軟件開發生態系統。繪製+代碼+執行
